channel.description: Recent content in API Rate Limits on DevDocs Navigation Menu Test

item.title: Core Rate Limits
item.description: Core Rate Limits Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This document presents introduces the three categories of core rate limit, and presents the tables of each. It compiles the three separate pages that currently do this Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Authn/End-user rate limitshttps://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/rl-global-enduser/ Management rate limitshttps://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/rl-global-mgmt/ Other endpoint rate limitshttps://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/rl-global-other-endpoints/ Structure type: Reference Content type: Reference lookup

item.title: Additional Rate Limits
item.description: Additional Rate Limits Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Needs a little tidy up but essentially the same page as currently exists Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Additional limits: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/rl-additional-limits/ Structure type: Reference Content type: Reference lookup Reference lookups consist mostly of a series of tables or lists where users can look up facts or definitions, interspersed with short explanatory texts that give those tables the correct context.

item.title: Monitor your usage with the Rate Limit Dashboard and Widget
item.description: Monitor your usage with the Rate Limit Dashboard and Widget Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Combines the dashboard page and widget section in the overview guide. Neds reworking to make it task-focused rather than an overview of the dashboard. State “How to” content type. Could be written as conceptual overview instead. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: ‘- Rate limit dashboard: https://developer.

item.title: Best practices for monitoring your API usage
item.description: Best practices for monitoring your API usage Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Straight copy of best practices doc. Rate limit response headers should already be in “Parsing an API response”, so need to figure out if repetition is fine or if that doc should be the single source of truth. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Rate limit best practices: https://developer.

item.title: Allow (and tune) for periods of excessive API traffic
item.description: Allow (and tune) for periods of excessive API traffic Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This document combines the section on Burst Rate Limits from the Rate Limits Overview doc and the DynamicScale doc into a Guidance doc for tweaking your rate limits until they are tuned correctly to your current needs. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: ‘- DynamicScale: https://developer.

item.title: Pre-May 2018 Rate Limits
item.description: Pre-May 2018 Rate Limits Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Straight port of existing “Previous Rate Limits” doc. Needs review. Is this doc necessary still? How many pre-May 2018 orgs are still in use? Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Previous rate limits: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/rl-previous/ Structure type: Reference Content type: Reference lookup Reference lookups consist mostly of a series of tables or lists where users can look up facts or definitions, interspersed with short explanatory texts that give those tables the correct context.

item.title: Rate limit warnings in your System Log
item.description: Rate limit warnings in your System Log Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Straight port of “System log events for rate limits” Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - System Log events for rate limits: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/rl-system-log-events/ Structure type: Reference Content type: Reference lookup Reference lookups consist mostly of a series of tables or lists where users can look up facts or definitions, interspersed with short explanatory texts that give those tables the correct context.

item.title: How are authentication requests measured?
item.description: How are authentication requests measured? Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Discursive document covering how unauthenticated requests to Okta’s OIDC \authorize and other anonymous-possible endpoints are counted and measured against existing rate limits. These are known as “Client-based rate limits”. Marked as no changes needed, but intro needs some work so it’s easier to understand the problem that client-based rate limits are trying to solve.
